name: MAC Lipstick - Ruby Woo - Classic Red Matte Lipstick
description: MAC Lipstick in Ruby Woo is a classic red matte lipstick known for its iconic, vivid red shade. Launched in 1999, Ruby Woo is a universally flattering color that works for all skin tones. This lipstick is famous for its intense pigmentation, long-lasting formula, and comfortable matte finish. Perfect for creating bold, statement looks or classic elegance. The rich, creamy texture glides on smoothly and provides full coverage with just one swipe. This staple shade is a must-have in any makeup collection.

name: Maybelline SuperStay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - Lover - Long-Lasting Matte Lip Color
description: Maybelline SuperStay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick in Lover is a long-lasting matte lip color that offers bold and vibrant color. Launched in 2017, this liquid lipstick is known for its 16-hour wear and high-impact color payoff. The innovative formula features a unique arrow applicator for precise application and a comfortable, non-drying matte finish. Perfect for all-day wear, this lipstick is ideal for creating bold, striking lip looks that stay put through anything your day brings.
